annotations.description: Brian keeps making garbage margaritas, so Trever's here to stop Brian from embarrassing himself (within reason) and start making spicy texas margaritas. ----...
annotations.title: Making a Spicy Texas Margarita

textContent:
3 Thin Serrano pepper slices
.25oz lime juice

Muddle

1.5oz Silver Tequila
.5oz Texas Orange Liqueur
.5oz Cointreau

Shake and double strain into salted glass
Add ice
Top with strong ginger beer/soda
Garnish with lime

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kv_LFeE-zOc
title: Spicy Texas Margarita
